mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDERS_DATE, A.ORDERS_ID, A.ORDERS_PICKUP_DATE, A.ORDERS_RETURN_DATE, A.ORDERS_ADDRESS, A.ORDERS_ADDRESS_DETAILS, A.ORDERS_REQUEST, C.COMMON_LAUNDRY_WEIGHT FROM ORDERS A INNER JOIN ORDERS_DETAIL B ON A.ORDERS_ID = B.ORDERS_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_LAUNDRY C ON B.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID = C.ORDERS_DETAIL_ID WHERE A.ORDERS_ID = #{ordersId}
